hotels.title: Sumatran Urban Retreat in Central Pekanbaru with Restaurant, Bars & Pool
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant energy of Sumatra with a contemporary Novotel stay in the bustling heart of Pekanbaru. Dive into the local culture with a visit to the nearby An-Nur Grand Mosque or the fascinating Riau Cultural Park. Savour the flavours of Indonesian cuisine at Food Exchange restaurant or enjoy a glass of wine at Molecule Gastro Bar. Unwind with a leisurely swim in the outdoor pool and rejuvenating treatments at the hotel spa, or enjoy some retail therapy at Ciputra Seraya Mall or Pekanbaru Mall, located just a short drive from the hotel.
